import React,{useState}from"react";import{useNavigate}from"react-router-dom";import{jsx as _jsx,jsxs as _jsxs}from"react/jsx-runtime";const ProductCard=_ref=>{let{product,addToCart}=_ref;const[quantity,setQuantity]=useState(1);const navigate=useNavigate();const updateQuantity=delta=>{setQuantity(prev=>Math.max(1,prev+delta));// Ensures quantity never goes below 1
};const handleProductDisplay=e=>{e.preventDefault();navigate("/display",{state:{product}});};return/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs("div",{className:"product-card card",children:[/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("img",{onClick:handleProductDisplay,src:product.img,className:"card-img",alt:product.name}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs("div",{className:"card-body",children:[/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("p",{className:"card-title",children:product.name}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs("span",{children:["$",typeof product.price==='number'?product.price.toFixed(2):'N/A']}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs("form",{onSubmit:e=>{e.preventDefault();addToCart(product,quantity);},className:"row p-1 product-form",children:[/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs("div",{className:"quantity-controls",children:[/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("button",{type:"button",className:"quantity-button",onClick:()=>updateQuantity(-1),"aria-label":"Decrease quantity",children:"-"}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("span",{className:"quantity-display",children:quantity}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("button",{type:"button",className:"quantity-button",onClick:()=>updateQuantity(1),"aria-label":"Increase quantity",children:"+"})]}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("button",{type:"submit",className:"mt-2 rounded-bottom",children:"Add to Cart"})]})]})]});};export default ProductCard;
